law_name: Utah Government Records Access and Management Act (GRAMA)
description: Fees must be reasonable and reflect actual costs
conditions: Fees must be reasonable and reflect actual costs

law_name: Utah Government Records Access and Management Act (GRAMA)
description: Cannot charge more than cost of fulfillment

law_name: Utah Government Records Access and Management Act (GRAMA)
description: May require payment before processing large requests
conditions: May require payment before processing large requests

law_name: Utah Government Records Access and Management Act (GRAMA)
description: Must provide estimate for requests exceeding $50
conditions: Must provide estimate for requests exceeding $50
